title: Balanced Parentheses Parser
description: Parse nested balanced parentheses structures, tracking depth and validating proper nesting. Demonstrates recursive structure handling.

motivation.why: Balanced delimiter parsing is fundamental to parsing programming languages, mathematical expressions, and any nested structure. It's a classic computer science problem with practical applications.

inputFormat.description: Text containing parentheses that must be properly balanced. Each opening '(' must have a matching closing ')'. Nesting is allowed.

outputFormat.description: The parser returns a ParenNode enum representing the structure with depth tracking.

type.description: ParenNode enum: Balanced { content: Box<ParenNode>, depth: usize }, Text(String), Empty(usize)

depth.description: Maximum nesting depth can be calculated
